attributes.action: Scrutinise denial of voting rights for EU citizens in UK and UK citizens in EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people feel that they were disenfranchised including UK citizens resident abroad. 
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-32872211
https://blogs.lse.ac.uk/europpblog/2017/02/09/brexit-referendum-human-rights/
https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/apr/28/british-expats-lose-legal-battle-right-to-vote-eu-referendum
https://www.independent.co.uk/voices/brexit-second-referendum-final-say-denied-vote-british-citizen-a8482411.html
attributes.background: EU citizens in the UK and UK citizens have been denied the right to vote in EU referendum. The democratic mandate of the 2016 referendum is hence in question. We demand a review of the democratic franchise criteria for EU residents, many with decades of residence and a new EU referendum.
